query.statement:
MERGE INTO SAPHEE.ZCST406 A
USING ( SELECT CAST(#G_MANDT# AS VARCHAR(3)) AS MANDT, CAST(#LIFNR# AS VARCHAR(24)) AS LIFNR FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.LIFNR = B.LIFNR
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.CS406_TP1 = #TP1# ,A.CS406_TP2 = #TP2# ,A.CS406_TP3 = #TP3# ,A.CS406_TP4 = #TP4# ,A.CS406_RGD = #RGD# ,A.CS406_RGN = #RGN# ,A.CS406_SCP = #SCP# ,A.CS406_RNAME = #RNAME# -- Áö»çÀå ,A.CS406_EMAIL = #EMAIL# ,A.CS406_HP = #HP# ,A.CS406_TEL = #TEL# ,A.CS406_FAX = #FAX# ,A.CS406_UDT = HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,A.CS406_UID = #G_USER_ID#
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( A.MANDT, A.LIFNR, A.CS406_EDT, A.CS406_CPT, A.CS406_FCD, A.CS406_LC1, A.CS406_LC2, A.CS406_LC3, A.CS406_LC4, A.CS406_LCR, A.CS406_TP1, A.CS406_TP2, A.CS406_TP3, A.CS406_TP4, A.CS406_RGD, A.CS406_RGN, A.CS406_SCP, A.CS406_IS1, A.CS406_IS2, A.CS406_IS3, A.CS406_IS4, A.CS406_IS5, A.CS406_ISR, A.CS406_CDT, A.CS406_CID, A.CS406_RNAME, A.CS406_EMAIL, A.CS406_HP, A.CS406_TEL, A.CS406_FAX, A.CS406_UDT, A.CS406_UID, A.CS406_WEL, A.CS406_TEMP ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# ,#LIFNR# ,'' ,0 ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,#TP1# ,#TP2# ,#TP3# ,#TP4# ,#RGD# ,#RGN# ,#SCP# ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' ,HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,#G_USER_ID# ,#RNAME# ,#EMAIL# ,#HP# ,#TEL# ,#FAX# ,'' ,'' ,'' ,'' )
